Claims Contacts.name: Amazon Logistics Claims
Claims Contacts.content: Amazon Logistics Claims – Reach out to Ariane. Send Order Number, AMZL Tracking Number, proof of refund, and screenshot of the tracking page.

Claims Contacts.name: FedEx, UPS, USPS Claims
Claims Contacts.content: FedEx, UPS, USPS Claims – Contact Elizabeth Gacula. Send Order Number, Tracking Number, and images for proof.
